ankit@gmail.com.message: Hey whats up
Not much, just serving customers! What can I get for you today?
Hey brother
Hey! What can I get for you today?
Hey bruder
Hey! What can I get for you today?
was ist los
Entschuldigung, was kann ich Ihnen bringen?
I want to buy a kaffee
Okay, a Kaffee! Sure, I can get that for you. Anything else?
Hey I need to get some milch too
Okay, I'll get you some milk. Anything else I can get for you?
Okay nice thanks,
You're welcome! Can I get you anything to drink or eat?
Ich möchte
Ich möchte ... Okay, was darf ich Ihnen bringen?
can you say milk
Milch. We have whole, skim, oat, and almond. Which would you like in your drink?
can you say coffee
Certainly! Coming right up! What kind of Kaffee would you like?
I want hilfe
Entschuldigung, ich spreche kein Deutsch. Can I help you in English?
